document.title: UX Report: DataONE Public Site Test Report: Phase II – Faculty, Staff, and Graduate Students
document.abstract: The Usability and Assessment Working Group conducted usability testing for DataONE public website (www.dataone.org) at University of Tennessee Knoxville from June 7th to June 20th, 2011.This document summarizes participants’ interactions with the DataONE site when searching for relevant information as well as their subjective ratings.
document.publication-title: DataONE Sociocultural and Usability & Assessment Working Groups
